info.name: Astor Office Chair
info.LongDescription:
You’ll love spending time working or studying in the stylish Astor office chair. Generously proportioned, this smart-looking chair is upholstered in either beautiful semi-aniline Randolf leather or in gorgeous Arena stain-resistant fabric. The seat is softly padded in channels to create a ripple effect for long-lasting comfort and features mobility details such as a height-adjustable, swiveling pedestal. The chair glides on nylon castors, making reaching for a file or phone easy. It also has a choice of two chrome-plated finishes on the frame: burnished nickel for the Arena Cement-covered chair or burnished bronze for the Randolph tan leather chair.

“With a softly padded seat upholstered in high-quality tan leather or cement grey fabric, the Astor is a very comfortable and fashionable choice of office chair,” Freedom furniture buyer Lucie McCann.
